duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform trailer switches from yard to load/unload door or vice versa, and coordinate movements with management.
Document trailer moves using Yard Management System or switcher cards, and conduct pre- and post-trip inspections on switcher equipment.
Understand and demonstrate effective yard switching safety processes and procedures.
Utilize "hand-to-surface" methods for package handling and lift, carry, push, and pull packages on a continuous basis.
Scan packages, read labels, verify numbers, and sort packages according to the appropriate conveyor system.
